verses.verse: It <S%H1471>happened,<s%> when all the nation had <S%H8552>completely<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> out of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> out of <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%>

and <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, <S%H5375><s%> 'Take from out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> out of the place where the <S%H3548>priests<s%>' <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H4673>stood<s%> <S%H3559>firm,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and carry them <S%H5674>over<s%> with <S%H3240>you,<s%> and lay them down in the lodging <S%H4411>place,<s%> where you will <S%H3885>lodge<s%> <S%H3915>tonight.<s%>'"

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> whom he had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> out of <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> a <S%H376>man.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5674>them,<s%> "Pass over <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> into the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H259>each<s%> of <S%H376>you<s%> pick <S%H7311>up<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> and put it on your <S%H7926>shoulder,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

that this may be a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> that when your children <S%H7592>ask<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H68><s%> 'What do you mean by these stones?'

then you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H4325>them,<s%> 'Because the waters of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> were cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> When it passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> were cut <S%H3772>off.<s%> These <S%H68>stones<s%> shall be for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>'"

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they carried them <S%H5674>over<s%> with them to the place where they <S%H4411>lodged,<s%> and laid them down <S%H3240>there.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> in the place where the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H4673>stood;<s%> and they are there to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> until <S%H1697>everything<s%> was <S%H8552>finished<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> according to all that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4116>hurried<s%> and passed <S%H5674>over.<s%>

It <S%H5971>happened,<s%> when all the people had <S%H8552>completely<s%> passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> that the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> with the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2571>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> spoke to <S%H1696>them.<s%>

About <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2502>men,<s%> ready and armed for <S%H6635>war<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> to the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

On that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3372>him,<s%> as they feared <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H6680>"Command<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> that they come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>"
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> therefore <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H3383>Jordan!<s%>"

It <S%H3548>happened,<s%> when the priests who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>' <S%H7272>feet<s%> were lifted <S%H5423>up<s%> to the dry <S%H2724>ground,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to their <S%H4725>place,<s%> and went <S%H3212>over<s%> all its <S%H1415>banks,<s%> <S%H8543>as<s%> <S%H8032>before.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H7097>border<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6965>set<s%> up those <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> which they took <S%H3947>out<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>

He <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "When your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H68><s%> 'What do these stones mean?'
Then you shall let your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3045>know,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3478><s%> 'Israel came <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on dry <S%H3004>land.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> dried <S%H3001>up<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5674>you,<s%> until you had passed over, as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> which he dried <S%H3001>up<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5674>us,<s%> until we had passed over;

that all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that it is <S%H2389>mighty;<s%> that you may <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3117>forever.<s%>'"
